Input requirement

Source: R/leontief-matrices.R
input_requirement.Rd

Input requirement

input_requirement(X, d)

Arguments

X

transaction matrix

d

final demand vector

Examples

set.seed(200100)
X <- matrix(rnorm(100), nrow = 10)
d <- rnorm(10)
input_requirement(X, d)
#>              [,1]       [,2]        [,3]       [,4]       [,5]        [,6]
